alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:20AM MST until January 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph through this afternoon. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Through 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Heavy snow bands combined with strong wind may result in localized blizzard conditions this afternoon/evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
